mapper.select: select * from mart_price where ingr_info_irdnt_nm = #{ingr_info_irdnt_nm} and mart_num = 1 and ROWNUM<=5
select * from mart_price where ingr_info_irdnt_nm = #{ingr_info_irdnt_nm} and mart_num = 2 and ROWNUM<=5
select * from mart_price where ingr_info_irdnt_nm = #{ingr_info_irdnt_nm} and mart_num = 3 and ROWNUM<=5
